mosinstall.name: MSN Weather Module
mosinstall.author: Joomla Penguin
mosinstall.description: Simple module to grab meteorological data, via MSN Weather. City codes are also available on MSN Weather. Example use: (PKXX0008=Karachi,PKXX0011=Lahore,PKXX0021=Quetta,PKXX0014=Peshawar) ATTENTION: /cache directory must be writable. EDIT The project is hosted at now github and modified by Ahmed Shaikh Memon ahmedshaikhm@hotmail.com, all the due credits goes to original author Joomla Penguin, Ahmed only made it work with latest changes.

param.description: Enter city codes separated by a comma (with no spaces).
